results.title: Epidemiology of Acute Pancreatitis in Southern Israel: A Retrospective Study.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, drug-induced @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@ is a common etiology, with disothiazide being the most common drug associated with @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010195 @@@pancreatitis@@@ followed by ACE-Inhibitors, @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
